tips: Use 30+ steps for production quality (25-40 recommended)
CFG scale 7.5-8.5 works best for most cases
Use comprehensive negative prompts to avoid common issues
Seed value allows reproducing the same image
Higher steps = better quality but longer generation time
CFG scale controls how closely to follow the prompt
